text: CLOSE MTV Jersey Shore films at the Jenk's and the Headliner Chris Jordan, @ ChrisFHJordan The Situation, Pauly D and Vinny play ball at the Headliner ( Photo : Chris Jordan ) They ’ re here and they ’ re filming. The cast and crew of MTV ’ s “ Jersey Shore Family Vacation, ” the hit sequel to “ Jersey Shore, ” spent the weekend of July 27 filming at nightclubs in Monmouth and Ocean counties. The guys hit the Headliner in Neptune on Saturday, July 28 and Monday, July 30 and Jenk ’ s Club in Point Pleasant Beach on Sunday, July 29, all three times with camera crews in tow.
